description:
With so many machine learning frameworks and libraries available,
writing a model isn’t a bottleneck anymore while putting your models
in production is still a challenge.

In this talk, you will learn how we deploy the python deep learning
models in production at Booking.com.

Topics will include:

- Deep Learning model training in Docker containers
- Automated retraining of models
- Deployment of models using Kubernetes
- Serving model predictions in containerized environment
- Optimising serving predictions for latency and throughput
title: How Booking.com serves Deep Learning model predictions
